entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , New Tecumseth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:51 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.0°C

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 6:33 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:33 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning early in the evening. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 6:33 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
